prompt:
A boldly alluring Korean woman in her 20s on tatami near a veranda railing, shadow grid
pattern falling across her shoulders and arms, golden hour.
Pose: seated sideways, one knee raised, one hand gripping the floor edge, torso subtly arched.
Expression: dominant gaze, half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile.
Outfit: ribbed knit top + pleated skirt/shorts (tasteful), matte texture.
Lighting: warm side/back light + pale bounce fill, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
No readable text/logos/watermarks; no HDR.
